name: Out of Control - Game Boy Color
name_original: Out of Control - Game Boy Color
description:
This is demake of my game Out of Control.
This was my first Game Boy game using ZGB.
Download the rom below. You will need an emulator to play it.

Also included is a 3DS .cia file if you know what to do with it.

Features
  • 9 unique levels
  • 8 unique enemies (visually at least)
  • A Boss fight
Credits: Free Music
  • Title screen theme - "Little Tune 11" created by krümel
  • World map theme - "Peppy Pop Song" created by krümel
Commissioned Music

Music was based on the originals created by Pan Lean

  • Level theme created by Scotty Rich
  • Boss theme created by Scotty Rich

Source code can be found HERE

If you are interested, you can play the original Out of Control demo HERE
